description: The history of procedure alternatives for a dental procedure.

columns.name: FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the finding record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the associated procedure alternative edit history in the dental procedure record. Together with FINDING_ID, this forms the foreign key to the DENTAL_PROCEDURE_HX table.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the historical edits to procedure alternatives associated with the dental procedure from the DENTAL_PROCEDURE_HX table.

columns.name: DENT_ALT_HX_PROC_ID
columns.description: The history of unique identifiers for alternative procedures associated with the dental procedure record.
